articles.title: Elton John shares heartbreak as Farewell Yellow Brick Road tour is postponed to 2021 - Mirror Online
articles.description: Elton John has cancelled this year's Farewell Yellow Brick Road UK and Europe tour due to the coronavirus - but has rescheduled the dates to 2021
articles.content:
Elton John has announced his Farewell Yellow Brick Road UK and Europe tour dates have been postponed until 2021.
